attributes.action: Provide more financial help during corona virus crisis. £94 doesn't cover costs
attributes.additional_details: £94 isn't enough for people with mortgages or families, who may not be able to work during this corona virus crisis. They are more likely to follow government advice to self isolate ect if they know it isn't going to cause them financial distress.
attributes.background:
To put some more funding in place for those having to self isolate.
OR
Pause mortgage payments/rent for those affected by cornavirus.
Pause household bills for those unable to work due to corona virus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
